sentences.en: An impressive showpiece . -- Booklist, starred review.
ARAYA IS THE SHOWPIECE OF ITALIAN STAIRCASES.
sentences.cn: 阿拉亚堪称意大利楼梯中的精品.

sentences.en: But as the material object showpiece of the exhibition, fair, save the development costs of enterprises.
sentences.cn: 可作为展览会 、 交易会的实物展品, 节省企业的开发成本.

sentences.en: Dutchman Robben himself is a major doubt for the Wembley showpiece.
sentences.cn: 荷兰人罗本自己能否在温布利登场还有很大的疑问.

sentences.en: If we have weird , as as wish the dog as the showpiece, don't get the Lab.
sentences.cn: 如果你有洁癖,而你养狗是拿来当展示品, 不要养拉拉.

sentences.en: If you are a neat freak, and want a dog as showpiece, don't get a Lab.
sentences.cn: 假如你有洁癖, 而你养狗是拿来当展示品, 不要养拉拉.

sentences.en: It was a magnificent showpiece – the public left very happy and us even more so.
sentences.cn: 决赛是一场绚丽的表演——观众们都很开心的离去,而我们更开心.

sentences.en: Its showpiece: four power - generating vertical axis wind turbines.
sentences.cn: 四台垂直轴风力涡轮机是这座大厦的一大特色.

sentences.en: The factory was to be a showpiece of Western investment in the East.
sentences.cn: 这家工厂将成为西方在东方投资的样板。

trans.tran_en: A showpiece is something that is admired because it is the best thing of its type, especially something that is intended to be impressive
